Quality Assurance (QA) & Quality control (QC) -   08/2013 – 12/2015
Member of Quality Assurance and Quality Control team .My working profile is to construct

Class Project:

The topic of our project is WEDM (Wire Electric Discharge Machine).WEDM is a 
technology by which we can cut s contour with a bend saw, by a slowly moving wire 
travel with the discharge acting like a cutting teeth.

In our project we improved its efficiency and MMR rate. We also work on surface 
finishing operation.
